name: Glasskube
long_description: Glasskube is building a new packaging ecosystem for Kubernetes. With our Open Source package manager, we aim to replace Helm in the long run and give users a Docker-like experience to build, extend, deploy and distribute Kubernetes applications. We're also working on a cloud-native templating language so anyone building packages for Kubernetes can use a DSL and won't have to use the Go templating engine anymore.
one_liner: The next generation Package Manager for Kubernetes
